1.title: Getting Started
1.plot: Almost Live follows author, bigfoot researcher, and adventurer Thomas Marcum as he hunts for Bigfoot in the deeps woods of Kentucky. Thomas explores several Bigfoot hotspots during the season to uncover various Bigfoot evidence in Season 2.

2.title: Bigfoot Hotspot
2.plot: Thomas heads out to a Bigfoot hotspot. It is a rainy day and the going is treacherous. This area is a place where Thomas has previously had success in finding Bigfoot evidence. This is the area where he captured a game cam photograph of a Bigfoot back in 2013.

3.title: After the Rain
3.plot: The mountains are slick and dangerous after the hard rains but Thomas goes out anyways. Thomas has returned to pick up his game cameras and search for more evidence of Bigfoot. He discovers some interesting stick structures.

4.title: Too Hot for Bigfoot
4.plot: Its a very hot and humid day but Thomas returns to the Bigfoot Hotspot to retrieve the game camera. While in the area he explores for more evidence that Bigfoot is still traveling this part of the forest.

5.title: I Make Fire
5.plot: Thomas returns to a familiar area to retrieve one game camera. He also explores the area and find a possible Bigfoot track. Also he shows viewers an easy way to make fire.

6.title: Bigfoot Tracks
6.plot: Back in the Bigfoot hotspot to pick up a remaining game camera. Thomas discovers several Bigfoot tracks and makes a track casting.

7.title: Time to Dig
7.plot: Thomas gives an update about some recent tragedies in his families lives. On this particular day it is Thomas' birthday and what better way to spend a birthday than to be in the forest.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Thomas ventures out on a rainy day to film the pilot of Almost Live. This adventure was cut short due to heavy rains but it served the purpose of lunching the series. Thomas talks about bigfoot and ginseng hunting. He also discovers a very large track.

2.title: Ginseng and Bigfoot
2.plot: Thomas hikes into a remote area looking for ginseng and evidence of bigfoot. The ginseng digging is a little sparse but finding a series of large bigfoot tracks makes his efforts all worth it.

3.title: Amazing Discoveries
3.plot: Thomas makes several interesting discoveries and finds some pretty good ginseng. The findings re-energize and uplifts him. This will have you curious as to what will come next.

4.title: More Bigfoot Stuff
4.plot: Thomas returns to the area where he found a couple of bigfoot structures. He was excited and couldn't wait to get back into that area and check it out more. This day did not disappoint at all. If you want to actually learn about some of the behavior patterns of bigfoot, you really need to watch this show and the previous, They are packed with findings of bigfoot behavior.

5.title: More Bigfoot and Game Cams
5.plot: On this particular day, Thomas returns to set up several game cameras. This is the area where he recently found several stick formations. He also shows you several other interesting things from his neck of the woods.

6.title: Sick, But Doing it Anyway
6.plot: Thomas is not feeling very good but it sure didn't stop him from enjoying a nice day in the mountains. He covers a large area hunting for ginseng and looking for possible bigfoot sign. He finds several things that you might find interesting.

7.title: Ginseng Hunting & Bigfooting
7.plot: This is ginseng season. The time of year that Thomas is in the mountains more than normal. He enjoys hunting ginseng and it gives him yet another reason to walk the mountains. It also gives him more opportunities to search for bigfoot related evidence. He travels into areas he normally does not get into but a couple times a year. It is a chance to learn more about nature, animals and bigfoot.

8.title: Rock Stack Explained
8.plot: Thomas is in one of the roughest areas he has been in this year. The area was thick with briers and high weeds. The high weeds hid potholes and rocks. He fines a few interesting things during this journey, including a Rock Stack. Rock stacks are sometimes thought to be made by Bigfoot. He explains how and why this one was made.

9.title: Game Cam Retrieval
9.plot: Thomas goes out to retrieval game cams and look for some ginseng. Once he gets to the second and third game cams, He is surprised at what he fines.

10.title: Final Game Cam Retrieval
10.plot: The season finale. Its the final trip of the year to retrieve the last of the game cameras. It is a lovely fall day and the animals are moving about. Once again something has attacked two of the game cameras, will the video show exactly what it was this time. Plus the first news of a possible season 2.

imdb.title: Almost Live
plot: _Almost Live_ (qv) follows author, Bigfoot researcher, survivalist and adventurer Thomas Marcum as he explores the deeps woods of Kentucky. The show is presented in a raw, uncut live footage format.::Thomas Marcum
